'''0.1.2''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with client version [[Alpha v1.0.16_01|v1.0.16_01]] on August 12, 2010.<ref name="blogpost">{{twon|943095997|Minecraft Alpha v1.0.16_01, Minecraft Server 0.1.2|August 12, 2010}}</ref>

0.1.2 was reuploaded to add support for the {{cmd|save-on}} command.<ref name="blogpost"/>

== Additions ==
* Added support for new commands:
** {{cmd|tp <player1> <player2>}} moves player1 to player2's location.
** {{cmd|save-all}} forces a full save to disk.
** {{cmd|save-off}} disables all saving (except save-all).
** {{cmd|save-on}} re-enables saving.

== Reupload additions ==
* Added support for {{cmd|save-on}}.
